name: Tuning is Cool (School)
description:
Tuning is Cool is a game that you can  choose and put objects the way you want and decorate the old cloister at  Vic School of Arts. 

You can make the school funnier with a snooker or a popcorn machine. Insteat if you prefer jump into an imaginary world you can enter in the well  go  through the tube and discover what's underneath.

There is a place inspired in our favorite 90's game. Then you can add objects and make it yours!
